I.name: Rock Surfing
description: {{sbc|Innate:}} '''Taliyah''' gains {{sti|ms|{{as|{{pp|10;15;25;40|1;9;12;15|key=%}}|ms}}}} {{as|'''bonus''' movement speed}} while near [[terrain]], which builds up over 1 second while in range for at least {{fd|0.4}} seconds, and decays by the {{tt|same amount|See notes}} once out of range for at least 3 seconds.
Entering [[combat status|combat]] or casting an [[champion ability|ability]] puts ''Rock Surfing'' on a {{sti|cd|2-second}} cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in these states.
I.descriptionHtml:
Innate: Taliyah gains 1;9;12;15 ‒ undefined bonus movement speed while near terrain, which builds up over 1 second while in range for at least 0.4 seconds, and decays by the same amount once out of range for at least 3 seconds.
Entering combat status or casting an champion ability puts Rock Surfing on a 2-second cooldown, which refreshes continuously while remaining in these states.
I.notes:
* The build up and decay changes by the same amount in the same interval, which is 25% of the maximum value every {{fd|0.25}} seconds.
* ''Rock Surfing'' can interact with [[Terrain#Player-Generated|player-generated terrain]].

Q1.name: Threaded Volley
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' throws a volley of 5 ''Stone Shards'' in the target direction over {{fd|1.5}} seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing {{as|magic damage}} to nearby enemies and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.
'''Taliyah''' can move and cast other abilities while launching ''Stone Shards'', and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third ''Stone Shard''.

Casting ''Threaded Volley'' creates a 400-unit area of {{as|Worked Ground|terrain}} at '''Taliyah's''' location that lasts {{tt|30|Unaffected by ability haste}} seconds. Casting ''Threaded Volley'' on {{as|Worked Ground|terrain}} will instead consume the area to become empowered with a new effect, cost {{sti|{{as|20 mana}}}} and have {{sti|cdr|50%}} reduced cooldown, though not below {{fd|0.75}} seconds.

{{sbc|Empowered Active:}} '''Taliyah''' hurls a ''Boulder'' that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing {{ccs|190%|magic}} damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies, {{tip|slow|slowing}} all targets hit for {{fd|1.5}} seconds and {{tip|standard sight|revealing}} them for {{fd|0.5}} seconds.

Against {{tip|monsters}}, ''Threaded Volley'' deals {{as|30|magic damage}} {{as|(+ 10% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} per ''Stone Shard'', and the ''Boulder'' deals {{as|{{ap|30*1.9}}|magic damage}} {{as|(+ {{ap|10*1.9}}% AP)}} {{as|'''bonus''' magic damage}} against the primary target. This '''bonus''' damage is unaffected by the damage modifier from subsequent hits.
Q1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah throws a volley of 5 Stone Shards in the target direction over 1.5 seconds that each shatter upon the first enemy hit, dealing magic damage to nearby enemies and revealing them for 0.5 seconds. Subsequent hits deal 40% damage.
Taliyah can move and cast other abilities while launching Stone Shards, and is unable to basic attack until she launches the third Stone Shard.
Casting Threaded Volley creates a 400-unit area of Worked Ground at Taliyah's location that lasts 30 seconds. Casting Threaded Volley on Worked Ground will instead consume the area to become empowered with a new effect, cost 20 mana and have 50% reduced cooldown, though not below 0.75 seconds.
Empowered Active: Taliyah hurls a Boulder that explodes upon the first enemy hit, dealing Unknown value: ccs / 190% / magic damage to them and normal damage to nearby enemies, slowing all targets hit for 1.5 seconds and revealing them for 0.5 seconds.
Against monsters, Threaded Volley deals 30 (+ 10% AP) bonus magic damage per Stone Shard, and the Boulder deals (+ % AP) bonus magic damage against the primary target. This bonus damage is unaffected by the damage modifier from subsequent hits.
leveling: {{st|Magic Damage|{{ap|40 to 120}} {{as|(+ 50% AP)}}|Reduced Damage|{{ap|40*0.4 to 120*0.4}} {{as|(+ {{ap|50*0.4}}% AP)}}|Maximum Single-Target Damage|{{ap|40*2.6 to 120*2.6}} {{as|(+ 130% AP)}}}}
Q1.notes:
* ''Threaded Volley'' will continue casting while in {{tip|stasis}}.
* The first ''Stone Shard'' hit on each target is considered {{tip|spell damage}}, while additional ones of the same cast are considered {{tip|persistent damage}}.
* The first ''Stone Shard'' is launched instantly after the cast time ends, then the second and third ''Stone Shards'' are both launched over 1 second, and finally the fourth and fifth ''Stone Shards'' are both launched over {{fd|0.5}} seconds. 
* {{tip|Spell shield}} only prevents one instance of damage.

effects.str:
• Magic Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Reduced Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Maximum Single-Target Damage: (+ 130% AP)

• Primary Target Damage: (+ % AP)
  • Secondary Target Damage: (+ 50% AP)
  • Slow: %

W.name: Seismic Shove
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' marks the target location and selects a direction. After {{rutngt|0.75}}, a ledge erupts from the area that {{tip|airborne|knocks}} enemies hit 400 units in the target direction over 1 second.
W.descriptionHtml: Active: Taliyah marks the target location and selects a direction. After 0.759, a ledge erupts from the area that knocks enemies hit 400 units in the target direction over 1 second.
W.notes: * The delay is measured from the start of the cast, before the cast time.

E.name: Unraveled Earth
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' scatters a field of 22 stones across the ground in the target direction that deals {{as|magic damage}} to enemies hit. The stones remain for 4 seconds and {{tip|slow}} enemies within the area by 20%.

Enemies that {{tip|dash}} or are {{tip|airborne|knocked}} into a stone will detonate it, dealing {{as|magic damage}} and {{tip|stun|stunning}} them for 2 seconds, which is then set to {{fd|0.75}} seconds for non-{{tip|monsters}} after the movement ends.

An enemy can detonate up to 4 stones, but the damage is reduced by {{pp|changedisplay=true|key=%|type=stones detonated|0 to 75 for 4}}. ''Unraveled Earth'' can affect targets only once per cast; the stones will still detonate but not apply their effects.
E.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah scatters a field of 22 stones across the ground in the target direction that deals magic damage to enemies hit. The stones remain for 4 seconds and slow enemies within the area by 20%.
Enemies that dash or are knocked into a stone will detonate it, dealing magic damage and stunning them for 2 seconds, which is then set to 0.75 seconds for non-monsters after the movement ends.
An enemy can detonate up to 4 stones, but the damage is reduced by 0% − 75 for 4% (based on level). Unraveled Earth can affect targets only once per cast; the stones will still detonate but not apply their effects.
Unraveled Earth deals 150% damage against monsters.
leveling: {{st|Minimum Detonation Damage|{{ap|25 to 105}} {{as|(+ 30% AP)}}|Maximum Detonation Damage|{{ap|25*(1+0.75+0.5+0.25) to 105*(1+0.75+0.5+0.25)}} {{as|(+ {{fd|82.5}}% AP)}}}}

effects.str:
• Minimum Detonation Damage: (+ 30% AP)
  • Maximum Detonation Damage: (+ 82.5% AP)

R1.name: Weaver's Wall
description: {{sbc|Active:}} '''Taliyah''' summons a torrent of spiraling rocks that cascades in the target direction, {{tip|airborne|knocking aside}} champions hit and erecting a wall of [[terrain]] in its wake. The wall lasts for 5 seconds after completion, then slowly disintegrates from the starting end.

'''Taliyah''' also {{tip|channels}} for 1 second, during which ''Weaver's Wall'' can be recast and she {{tip|sight|reveals}} herself. While the wall remains fully formed, she gains another recast empowered with a new effect.

{{sbc|Recast:}} Upon completing the {{tip|channel}}, '''Taliyah''' {{tip|dash|surfs}} on the wall as it emerges, {{tip|sight|revealing}} herself in the process. After {{fd|0.75}} seconds, she may input a movement command to {{tip|dash|jump}} off the wall to the target location, and automatically does so upon being {{tip|immobilize|immobilized}}, {{tip|polymorph|polymorphed}}, or reaching the finishing end.
''Weaver's Wall'' is placed on a {{sti|cd|3-second}} cooldown upon dealing {{tip|basic damage|basic}} or {{tip|ability damage}}, or upon taking {{tip|champion}} or {{tip|turret}} damage.
R1.descriptionHtml:
Active: Taliyah summons a torrent of spiraling rocks that cascades in the target direction, knocking aside champions hit and erecting a wall of terrain in its wake. The wall lasts for 5 seconds after completion, then slowly disintegrates from the starting end.
Taliyah also channels for 1 second, during which Weaver's Wall can be recast and she reveals herself. While the wall remains fully formed, she gains another recast empowered with a new effect.
Recast: Upon completing the channel, Taliyah surfs on the wall as it emerges, revealing herself in the process. After 0.75 seconds, she may input a movement command to jump off the wall to the target location, and automatically does so upon being immobilized, polymorphed, or reaching the finishing end.
Empowered Recast: Taliyah instantly destroys the wall.
Weaver's Wall is placed on a 3-second cooldown upon dealing basic or ability damage, or upon taking champion or turret damage.
R1.notes:
* The {{tip|dash|jump}} off distance can be extended to up to 1000 units when targeting across terrain.
* The initial cast counts as an ability activation for the purposes of on-cast effects such as {{tip|Spellblade}} and stacking {{ai|Force Pulse|Kassadin}}.
**However neither recasts do.
* '''Taliyah''' almost always jumps off of the wall to her left from when it reaches maximum range. If she is forced to jump off of the wall, she will do so towards the source that dealt damage or applied the crowd control to her.
* ''Weaver's Wall'', while {{tip|channel|channeling}}, can be recast while {{tip|ground|grounded}} but not while {{tip|root|rooted}}.
* {{ai|Wind Wall|Yasuo}} and {{ai|Blade Whirl|Samira}} will prevent ''Weaver's Wall'' from summoning any further but does not destroy any initial terrain it spawned. If '''Taliyah''' is surfing during the collision, she immediately becomes {{tip|stun|stunned}} for {{fd|0.25}} seconds, interrupting the surf.
* If '''Taliyah''' would enter terrain and the wall reaches maximum range inside, she is preemptively forced off the wall before entering.
** The wall can surpass the edges of the map, but '''Taliyah''' cannot.
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Taliyah''' is {{tip|channel|channeling}}:
** The channel is not {{tip|interrupt|interrupted}} by {{tip|ground}} and {{tip|root}} despite being a [[Channel#Movement Channels|movement channel]].
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false|interrupts=death, silence}}
* The following table refers for interactions while '''Taliyah''' is {{tip|dash|surfing}}:
{{ct|channel|attack=false|move=false|cast=false|consume=Disabled, but can activate trinkets|items=false|spells=false,false,false,interrupts,false|interrupts=death, root|damage=true}}
